comment.author: 47104434@N00
comment._content:
Great photo - is it 1930's (looking at the dresses, especially the 'shoulder wrap' bits)?  
Looking at the reflections it is opposite 'Hotel Arcadia', possibly Venice (it is prefaced by '..ice', and at the top of the door is reflected what look to be the word 'buono'.  Of course, I could be completely wrong :-)

comment.author: 47104434@N00
comment._content: Wow, I was really wrong, then :-) -- Seen on my Flickr home page. (?)
